text: This Love of Ours is a 1945 American romantic drama movie directed by William Dieterle and was based on a play by Luigi Pirandello. It stars Merle Oberon, Claude Rains, Charles Korvin, Carl Esmond, Sue England, Jess Barker, Helene Thimig, Ralph Morgan, Harry Davenport, Howard Freeman and was nominated for an Academy Award in 1946. It was distributed by Universal Pictures and was remade as Never Say Goodbye in 1956. ==Other websites== * Category:1945 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by William Dieterle Category:Universal Pictures movies
title: This Love of Ours
